params.newLicenseTermsId: The ID of the new default license terms.

setLicensingConfigForIp(address,(bool,ui.details: This function will set a global configuration for all licenses under a specific IP. However, this global configuration can be overridden by a configuration set at a specific license level.

params.ipId: The IP ID for which the configuration is being set.
params.licensingConfig: The MintingLicenseConfig to be set for all licenses under the given IP.

setLicensingConfigForLicense(address,add.details: This function can only be called by the LicensingModule.

params.ipId: The address of the IP for which the configuration is being set.
params.licenseTemplate: The address of the license template used.
params.licenseTermsId: The ID of the license terms within the license template.
params.licensingConfig: The configuration for minting the license.

params.isMintedByIpOwner: Whether the license token is minted by the IP owner.
params.licenseTemplate: The address of the license template where the license terms are defined.
params.licenseTermsId: The ID of the license terms will mint the license token.
params.licensorIpId: The address of the licensor IP.

returns._0: The configuration for minting the license.

attachLicenseTermsToIp(address,address,u.notice: Attaches license terms to an IP.

getAttachedLicenseTerms(address,uint256).notice: Gets the attached license terms of an IP by its index.

getAttachedLicenseTermsCount(address).notice: Gets the count of attached license terms of an IP.

getDerivativeIp(address,uint256).notice: got the derivative IP of an IP by its index.

getDerivativeIpCount(address).notice: Gets the count of derivative IPs of an IP.

getExpireTime(address).notice: Gets the expiration time for an IP.

getLicensingConfig(address,address,uint2.notice: Retrieves the minting license configuration for a given license terms of the IP. Will return the configuration for the license terms of the IP if configuration is not set for the license terms.

getParentIp(address,uint256).notice: got the parent IP of an IP by its index.

getParentIpCount(address).notice: Gets the count of parent IPs.

getParentLicenseTerms(address,address).notice: Returns the license terms through which a child IP links to a parent IP.

hasDerivativeIps(address).notice: Checks if an IP has derivative IPs.

hasIpAttachedLicenseTerms(address,addres.notice: Checks if an IP has attached any license terms.

isDerivativeIp(address).notice: Checks if an IP is a derivative IP.

isExpiredNow(address).notice: Checks if an IP is expired.

isParentIp(address,address).notice: Checks if an IP is a parent IP.

isRegisteredLicenseTemplate(address).notice: Checks if a license template is registered.

registerDerivativeIp(address,address[],a.notice: Registers a derivative IP and its relationship to parent IPs.

registerLicenseTemplate(address).notice: Registers a new license template in the Story Protocol.

setDefaultLicenseTerms(address,uint256).notice: Sets the default license terms that are attached to all IPs by default.

setLicensingConfigForIp(address,(bool,ui.notice: Sets the MintingLicenseConfig for an IP and applies it to all licenses attached to the IP.

setLicensingConfigForLicense(address,add.notice: Sets the minting license configuration for a specific license attached to a specific IP.

verifyMintLicenseToken(address,address,u.notice: Verifies the minting of a license token.
